welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Jose Marmol, Argentina! Known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and warm hospitality, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's charm and discover all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ezeiza Ministro Pistarini Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ezeiza Ministro Pistarini Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
